metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3560 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description: It was found that polkit could be tricked into bypassing the credential checks for D-Bus requests, elevating the privileges of the requestor to the root user. This flaw could be used by an unprivileged local attacker to, for example, create a new local administrator. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> commit introducing issue was backported to policykit-1 version in Ubuntu in focal+

criterions.comment: policykit-1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
